import React, {useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { btnstl } from './About.mjs' export default function Navbar(props) { //data-bs-theme="dark" const lg = "light"; const drk = "dark"; return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
{/* switch for mode change */}
) } Navbar.propTypes = {title : PropTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText : PropTypes.string} Navbar.defaultProps = { title : "Set Title Here", aboutText : "About" }
